notes: üéØ GOAL: Enforce full UI, theming, and accessibility compliance across all screens in v1.3
‚úÖ Before applying changes, parse each modified file and ensure valid JS/TS syntax.
‚úÖ If a file fails to parse, immediately revert changes for that file and skip.
‚úÖ After bulk changes, run a global build or type-check to verify project integrity.
‚úÖ No commit or push if any fatal syntax error is found post-pass.
‚úÖ Alert the user (with file/line numbers) for any files not auto-fixable‚Äîmanual review required.
‚úÖ Lint and run tests after all refactors, before commit/push.
‚úÖ All text must be wrapped in <Text> components. All colors and spacing must use tokens from useTheme().
‚úÖ Accessibility props required: accessibilityRole, accessible, accessibilityLabel on all touchables.
‚úÖ Enforce UI/UX guidelines: Use only centralized typography, spacing, and color tokens. No hardcoded values.
‚úÖ Confirm all navigation routes are valid and type-safe.
üìå BEFORE ANY FILE CHANGES: Commit a rollback checkpoint for full Git recovery. Use descriptive tags and commit messages for easy rollback.

before: git commit -m "chore(rollback): full snapshot before UI enforcement v1.3"

onReloadHang: Move to background and resume automatically

actions: Wrap all unwrapped strings in <Text> components (see JSX_ENFORCEMENT_COMPLETE.md)
Fix layout clipping due to missing numberOfLines or flexShrink
Apply typography tokens to titles, section headers, body text (see ui-guidelines.md)
phases.commit: fix: enforce text wrapping and readability

actions: Replace all hardcoded spacing/margin/padding with spacing tokens from useTheme()
Update all card/button/fab layouts to use standardized style objects from theme
Enforce pagePaddingHorizontal on all screen containers
Replace any inline/static colors with tokens.colors from useTheme() (see THEMING_ENFORCEMENT_SUMMARY.md and THEMING_GUIDE.md)
phases.commit: fix: theming, spacing, and layout enforcement

actions: Add accessibilityRole, accessible, and accessibilityLabel to all touchables and pressables
Fix modals and SVG elements with missing accessibility props
Ensure all clickable elements pass audit script (see scripts/audit-clickable-elements.js)
Validate all navigation calls use constants from routes manifest

phases.section: Final Lint, Test, and Documentation Pass
actions: Run npm run lint and npm run test:unit on entire codebase
Alert user to any non-auto-fixable files, with file and line numbers
Update docs/ui-guidelines.md and CHANGELOG if any patterns or enforcement logic changed
